description: The Custom Login Page Styler – Limit Login Attempts – Restrict Content With Login – Redirect After Login – Change Login URL – Sign in , Sign out plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the lps_handle_delete_all_logs(), lps_handle_delete_login_log(), and lps_handle_end_session() functions in all versions up to, and including, 7.1.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete login logs and end user sessions.

product.name: Custom Login Page Styler – Limit Login Attempts – Restrict Content With Login – Redirect After Login – Change Login URL – Sign in , Sign out
